thread.title: The Future of the Car Revealed at TU-Automotive Europe 2015
thread.title_full: The Future of the Car Revealed at TU-Automotive Europe 2015 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: The Future of the Car Revealed at TU-Automotive Europe 2015
text:
Next week 1,100 senior connected car execs will descend on the ICS Messe Stuttgart to shape the future of automotive at The TU-Automotive Europe Conference & Exhibition (2nd-3rd November).
Stuttgart, Germany (PRWEB) October 26, 2015
Technological change is revolutionising transportation; and it’ll never be the same again. At TU-Automotive Europe this revolution will be brought to life on stage by 100+ senior speakers (C-levels from BMW, Mercedes-Benz, Daimler, GM, and more) and in demonstrations showcasing the latest innovations on the exhibition floor from companies such as Ericcson, INRIX, Qualcomm, TomTom and Vodafone. This is where the leaders of the automotive community join mobility and tech disruptors (Samsung, Facebook – just announced, Huawei) to establish new partnerships, find new start-ups and uncover new ideas.
TU-Automotive’s director of strategy Gareth Ragg commented “No longer are automakers just the creators of 'wheels and steel' but now they’re the 'providers of mobility solutions'".
He continued “This new reality has created an ecosystem in flux. TU-Automotive Europe is where this community will have the discussions to move forwards. This is a must-attend event for anyone wanting a future in connected car and auto mobility.”
Limited tickets now remain. Register on the website: http://www.tu-auto.com/europe/
Limited Passes Now Remain
Passes for the event have almost sold out so TU-Automotive advises that interested parties register ASAP. Those at the event will experience:
 The Best 2 Days Out of the Office All Year – Unparalleled intelligence on key trends e.g. cyber-security, in-car data, future mobility & automated tech will fully prepare attendees with strategies for 2016 and beyond
 1,100 Attendees From Across The Ecosystem – Whether representing a start-up, a multinational OEM or a rapidly-expanding software provider, there is every opportunity to find a business partner at this event
 100+ Senior-Level Speakers- With more leadership job titles on stage than ever - e.g. BMW, FCA, Volvo, GM & Daimler – this event offers unparalleled access to industry thought-leaders
The full agenda and speaker line-up is available on the website: http://www.tu-auto.com/europe/
A limited number of passes now remain. Please contact the TU-Automotive team for further information on europe(at)tu-auto(dot)com or + 44 (0) 207 375 7585/ 1 800 814 3459 ext. 7585
About TU-Automotive
TU-Automotive is a world leader in providing events and business intelligence to the automotive technology community, covering telematics, auto mobility, autonomous vehicles and legal & insurance. You can sign up to receive free weekly updates, including exclusive industry analysis, interviews and insights at: http://www.tu-auto.com
